response.original_title: Tots TV: The Naughty Puppies And Other Stories
response.overview: Further adventures with loveable puppets Tilly, Tom and Tiny, whose escapades in the real world are designed to encourage children to think for themselves. Stories included are 'The Naughty Puppies', 'Tom's Storybook', 'Accidents Will Happen', 'The Dirty Old Boat', 'Watering the Garden' and 'A Watery Surprise'.
response.title: Tots TV: The Naughty Puppies And Other Stories
